hjb.msg.codec
Class ByteCodec

java.lang.Object
  hjb.msg.codec.BaseValueCodec
      hjb.msg.codec.ByteCodec
All Implemented Interfaces:
TypedValueCodec
public class ByteCodec
extends BaseValueCodec

ByteCodec is used to encode/decode between byte property values in JMS Messages and string values in HJBMessages

Author:
Tim Emiola
